name: Secret Aardvark Habanero Hot Sauce - Habanero Peppers & Roasted Tomatoes, Medium Spiced Hot Sauce, BBQ Sauce, Non-GMO, Low Sugar, Low Carb, Hot Sauce & Marinade - 8 fl oz 1 Pack
short_description: A HOT SAUCE FOR FLAVOR ENTHUSIASTS - Secret Aardvark Habanero sauce is a unique Caribbean/Tex-Mex sauce made with flavorful habanero peppers and roasted tomatoes - works great as a sauce and marinade
MEDIUM SPICED HOT SAUCE - Our original hot sauce was featured on Hot Ones Season 4 because of its savory yet spicy kick. Our hot Habanero Sauce amps any dish and can be used on everything! Enjoy!
MADE IN THE USA - Our hot sauces and marinades are made in the USA with non-GMO, natural ingredients and no artificial colors or flavors. Thoughtful ingredients that take your meals to the next level
USE ON ANYTHING - Our Habanero Sauce adds something special to dang near anything and is perfect for experienced or novice chefs. Spice up old favorites or try out one of our delicious recipes
SLINGN' SAUCE SINCE 2004 - We're not a one-note sauce. Our collection of Secret Aardvark Hot Sauces has pushed flavor boundaries, giving you high-quality sauces and marinades you can use time & again

name: El Yucateco Red Habanero Sauce, 4 oz., 6 Pack, 8,550 Average Scoville Units, Gluten Free, Sugar Free
short_description: NUMBER ONE HABANERO SAUCE IN THE US: El Yucateco Red Habanero Sauce is created with our classic recipe, a blend of habanero peppers, red tomatoes, select spices and seasonings.
NUMBER ONE HABANERO SAUCE IN THE US: El Yucateco Red Habanero Sauce is created with our classic recipe, a blend of habanero peppers, red tomatoes, select spices and seasonings.
AVERAGE SCOVILLE RATING of 8,550 units. Scoville ratings are approximate and can vary from batch to batch.
MAXIMUM HABANERO FLAVOR: We get the maximum amount of Habanero pepper flavor to shine through our hot sauces by using minimal preservatives.
GLUTEN FREE AND SUGAR FREE:El Yucateco Red Habanero Sauce is gluten free and sugar free.
FAMILY OWNED: El Yucateco is a family owned and operated business. Our hot sauces are made on the Yucatan Peninsula of Mexico.
NO REFRIGERATION REQUIRED: No refrigeration needed before or after opening.

USE EL YUCATECO to give your guacamole a zesty touch, or spice up your Bloody Mary, Michelada or Sangrita with a few drops of our delicious hot sauce. Available in Red, Green, XXXtra Hot, Black, Caribbean, Chipotle, Jalapeno, and Variety Pack.

name: Melinda’s Mango Habanero Hot Sauce - Sweet & Mild Mango Habanero Sauce Made with Real Mango, Fresh Peppers, Vinegar, Carrot & Lime - 10oz Squeeze, 1 Pack
short_description: A LITTLE HEAT, A LITTLE SWEET: Looking for a hot sauce with just as much heat as sweet? Melinda’s Mango Habanero is where sweet and heat live in perfect harmony. A fruit-forward hot sauce with a bite at the end and hint of lime juice gives your food island vibes.

SET YOUR MOUTH ON FLAVOR: You want fire? That’s easy. Anyone can strike a match, but few can strike a balance. Our Mango Habanero Hot Sauce is a mild 1 out of 5 heat level combined with a complex blend of spicy sweet, and acidity that packs a punch of sizzling heat without losing out on its deep flavor.

WHOLE, FRESH INGREDIENTS: Real ingredients like mango, carrot, garlic, onion, carrots, sugar and lime juice plus the best peppers on the planet, Melinda’s crafts their condiment sauces with whole, fresh ingredients for people who care about those kinds of things.

LEVELED UP FOOD, EVERYDAY PRICE: Level up your favorite dishes with a spicy kick from Melinda’s Mango Habanero Hot Sauce! This sweet habanero sauce enhances the flavor and sweetens the bite of whatever you’re eating right now. Enjoy it in fruit salsas, drizzled on a fish taco, as a grilled shrimp glaze, spicy mango margaritas and on practically everything.

MADE THE MELINDA’S WAY: At Melinda’s, our philosophy is simple: heat and flavor mean everything. We pride ourselves on striking that perfect balance of heat and flavor in every sauce we make so that you can have an eating experience unlike any other.

name: Heartbeat Hot Sauce Co. | Red Habanero, 6 oz.
short_description: Classic Heat: Red Habanero hot sauce is a versatile go to with a finely balanced flavor. Red habaneros, the sweetness of bell peppers and the brightness of fresh lime juice create a medium heat that will bring new life to all your favorite foods. This vegan, gluten free hot sauce is a classic with heart.

Memory-Making Pairings: Red Habanero hot sauce is a 4 out of 10 on the Heartbeat Heat Scale and is a universal hot sauce that is great for both savory and sweet food pairings. Enjoy on burgers, nachos, pizza and peanut butter & iceberg lettuce sandwiches.

Flavor Forward: Our small batch, all natural, flavor-forward hot sauces, are handmade and preservative free, with maximum flavor and balance in mind. Our sauces are bright, bold, healthy and deliciously unique.

Squeeze Bottle: Our 6 oz. squeeze bottle is the perfect design for an easy grab and drizzle. The easy to use, adjustable tip means no mess and no overpouring or slow drips. Get exactly how much hot sauce you want, exactly where you want it, for one delicious bite after another.

All Natural: We ferment our peppers using traditional methods, then cook them with a few high quality ingredients. We add no water, thickening agents or chemical preservatives of any kind. All of our products are proudly developed, cooked, bottled, packaged and distributed from the South Core of Thunder Bay, Ontario.

name: El Yucateco XXXtra Hot Habanero Hot Sauce, 4 oz (Pack of 6) – 11,250 Avg Scoville Units, Gluten-Free & Sugar-Free, Authentic Mexican Habanero Sauce for Tacos, BBQ & Spicy Food Lovers
short_description: OUR HOTTEST SAUCE WITH GREAT FLAVOR: El Yucateco XXXtra Hot Habanero Sauce is a unique recipe from the culinary traditions of the ancient Mayan civilization, hence the name “Kutbil-Ik” - a Mayan word meaning “crushed chili”.

OUR HOTTEST SAUCE WITH GREAT FLAVOR: El Yucateco XXXtra Hot Habanero Sauce is a unique recipe from the culinary traditions of the ancient Mayan civilization, hence the name “Kutbil-Ik” - a Mayan word meaning “crushed chili”.

MAXIMUM HABANERO FLAVOR: We get the maximum amount of Habanero pepper flavor to shine through our hot sauces by using minimal preservatives.
GLUTEN FREE AND SUGAR FREE: El Yucateco XXXtra Hot Habanero Sauce is gluten free and sugar free.
FAMILY OWNED: El Yucateco is a family owned and operated business. Our hot sauces are made on the Yucatan Peninsula of Mexico.
NO REFRIGERATION REQUIRED: No refrigeration needed before or after opening.

USE EL YUCATECO to give your guacamole a zesty touch, or spice up your Bloody Mary, Michelada or Sangrita with a few drops of our delicious hot sauce. Available in Red, Green, XXXtra Hot, Black, Caribbean, Chipotle, Jalapeno, and Variety Pack.

name: Marie Sharp’s Fiery Hot Habanero Pepper Sauce, 10 oz – Extra Hot Belizean Hot Sauce with Intense Heat & Flavor – All-Natural, Gluten-Free
short_description: Turn Up the Heat – Made for true heat seekers, this sauce blends Marie Sharp’s signature habaneros with extra firepower for bold, intense spice.
Authentic Belizean Flavor – Crafted in Belize using fresh, locally grown ingredients from the fertile Maya Mountain region.
Perfect for Heat-Lovers’ Favorites – Add to tacos, chili, wings, and grilled meats—one drop brings serious flavor and fiery satisfaction.
All-Natural & Gluten-Free – No artificial colors, preservatives, or thickeners. Non-GMO and gluten-free for a clean, pure burn.
